page.title: 08URCHFONT VILLAGE HALL
page.content: BUILT BY VOLUNTARY LABOUR, OPENED IN 1929, IT IS HIRED FOR MEETINGS AND ACTIVITIES BY LOCAL GROUPS INCLUDING MOTHERS AND TODDLERS, PRE-SCHOOL PLAY GROUP, YOUTH CLUB,WOMENS ORGANIZATIONS, FRIENDS AND NEIGHBOURS OVER SIXTY. ALSO HELD THERE THE CHURCH FETE, WOMEN'S INSTISTUTE FLOWER SHOW, DANCING, BADMINTON, CRAFT CLASSES, SOCIAL EVENTS, PRIVATE PARTYS, PARISH COUNCIL MEETINGS, GENERAL AND LOCAL ELECTIONS, HEALTH CLINIC. NINE YEARS AGO A WAITING ROOM AND SURGERY WERE BUILT ONTO THE HALL AND A SURGERY IS HELD THERE 3 TIME A WEEK BY LOCAL DOCTORS. THE BOILER, ORIGINALLY SOLID FUEL FINALLY FAILED AND IN 1985 AFTER NUMEROUS FUND RAISING EVENTS CULMUNATING IN A GRAND CONCERT BY LOCAL PEOPLE.Â£1900 WAS RAISED TO PROVIDE A NEW BOILER.
